features: 【Personalize】Designed privacy screen for iPhone 15 Pro Max, experience the gradient changes from blue to purple at different angles, making your phone color changeable, cool and unique.
【28° Privacy Protection】Privacy screen protector for 15 Pro Max, the screen is only visible to people within 28°. Protect your privacy and sensitive information when in public.
【High Hardness】 GIGIKISS for iPhone 15 Pro Max privacy tempered glass screen protector is made 9H hardness, making it more impact and scratch-resistant.
【Sensitive Touch】Screen protector for iPhone 15 Pro Max privacy glass perfectly balances privacy protection and sensitive touch, ensuring quick app operation and sensitive gameplaying.

【Easy Installation】Our package includes a purple privacy screen protector, auxiliary tools, mounting frame, and user manual for an easy bubble-free installation. Our 24/7 online support will assist with any issues or concerns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this and get compliments on it all the time. The glass quality is high, does not distort or warp your view of things, and installation is a breeze. My one complaint is that it seems rather fragile, as I have broken, two or three of them already… I guess they are doing their job and saving my screen, but they don’t seem all that robust. They can also be very highly reflective out in bright sun, making it a little difficult to see your screen clearly at times. Still, my favorite part is the cool color reflection that catches everyone’s eye…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the color of the screen protector, it is easy to install too. The only thing is that it won't fully give you privacy, people can still see the screen but blurred. It also breaks easy, but I like product for the price I have ordered this product twice already.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Supposedly 9H n really good quality but still breaks easily.
reviews.reviewText: I’ve gone thru 3 screen protectors. At this point I just get them for the cool color but they have the same strengths as any normal cheap screen protector you buy. If you buy this one just buy it for the cool color not for the protection bc it does NOT protect your phone good at all, I’ve dropped my phone off the couch into the floor wich is a 1 foot drop and it shattered… it’s not good quality but it’s colorful n cool looking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Guardian of Privacy: Privacy Screen Protector Review
reviews.reviewText: As someone who values digital privacy, I recently invested in a Privacy Screen Protector for my smartphone, and the experience has been nothing short of transformative. This sleek and innovative accessory has become an essential layer of defense against prying eyes, elevating my mobile device usage to a new level of security and peace of mind.The standout feature of the Privacy Screen Protector is, of course, its ability to shield my screen from unwanted onlookers. The specially designed technology ensures that the display remains visible only to the person directly in front of the screen, preventing side-glancers from invading my personal space during commutes, meetings, or any other public setting.Installation was a breeze, and the precision-cut design flawlessly adhered to my smartphone screen. The ultra-thin yet durable construction not only provides privacy but also maintains the touch sensitivity and clarity of the display. There's no compromise on functionality – it's like having an invisible cloak for my screen that activates only when needed.Day-to-day use has only deepened my appreciation for the Privacy Screen Protector. Whether I'm browsing sensitive information, responding to emails, or engaging in private conversations, I can do so with confidence, knowing that my screen is shielded from prying eyes. The added layer of security is a small investment for the immense value it brings to my digital life.I've also noticed that the screen protector effectively reduces glare and reflections, enhancing visibility in various lighting conditions. This added benefit enhances the overall user experience, making it a practical choice for those who spend extended periods on their devices.While the initial purpose of the Privacy Screen Protector is to safeguard sensitive information, it has proven to be a multifaceted accessory. It not only protects my privacy but also contributes to a more comfortable and enjoyable mobile experience.In conclusion, the Privacy Screen Protector is a game-changer for anyone who values their digital privacy in an increasingly connected world. With its easy installation, durable design, and effective privacy technology, it's a must-have accessory that seamlessly blends security and functionality. Embrace the peace of mind that comes with knowing your screen is shielded from prying eyes – the Privacy Screen Protector is a worthy guardian of your digital privacy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I wish it came with 2pcs instead of 1
reviews.reviewText: However it’s still so beautiful and I have asked some tech guy to help me with installation because i don’t wanna risk it. It’s reflection not that strong when the screen is on.**** In the photos the phone was off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I loved the ease of installation with this screen saver. The guide frame they give makes sure you don't put it on all wonky and end up having to reinstall and the screen prep is minimal. If you want to get super technical, the purple color shown in the ad is a little exaggerated--it's more of a soft purple mirror effect, but it's still a really good privacy screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Cracked after a day
reviews.reviewText: I had this on my phone for a day and woke up this morning to see that it was cracked. I’m very frustrated. It was easy to install and looked good before it cracked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Definitely buying again! loved the purple color but it was difficult to see in the sunlight. But SUPER HEAVY DUTY! I have the iPhone 15 pro max and got out of my full size truck, laid my phone on the tire and forgot to grab it before I drove off. I found the phone screen down in my gravel driveway and the screen protector was DESTROYED, But when I peeled it off, my actual screen was PERFECTLY intact!!
